message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product. I'm excited to discuss the price with you. After careful consideration, I'm willing to offer you the product for $1100000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it brings to your business.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After careful consideration, I'm willing to offer $900000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it brings to my business.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still a bit above your offer. After reconsidering, I'm willing to offer you the product for $1050000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it brings to your business.

Thank you for your revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still a bit above your offer. After reconsidering, I'm willing to offer $950000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it brings to my business.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm still not willing to go that low. After reconsidering, I'm willing to offer you the product for $1025000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it brings to your business.

Thank you for your revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. After reconsidering, I'm willing to offer $975000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it brings to my business.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm still not willing to go that low. After reconsidering, I'm willing to offer you the product for $1000000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it brings to your business.
